summary:
Senior Electrical Engineer with nineteen years (19) of extensive experience on EPC/FEED Projects Developments and Management for the Energy, Oil & Gas (Onshore & Offshore) and Petrochemical Industries, with demonstrable knowledge of the main international standards and engineering recommended practices ANSI/IEEE, NFPA, NEMA, IEC, DNV & BS. 

Broad experience in the design of electrical power systems (at LV/MV & HV levels) for several important Large Companies and Corporations such as; TenneT (Germany), Petroleum Develop Oman - PDO (Oman), Saudi Basic Industries Corporation - Sabic (Saudi Arabia), Tüpras & Socar (Turkey), Saudi ARAMCO (Saudi Arabia), Venezuelan Oil Company -PDVSA (Venezuela), Citgo (EEUU), Venezuelan Petrochemical Company - Pequiven (Venezuela) and “Electricidad de Caracas” (Venezuela).

Also having experience as a Construction Supervisor, responsible for planning, control and execution of a set of electrical construction works (work-packages), field engineering (support to the STO “Site Technical Office”) and pre-commissioning activities of main electrical equipment: Power Transformers, LV & MV SWGs-MCCs, UPS. 

Finally having experience as a Jr. Project Manager, responsible for project budgets, planning, technical execution, overall follow up and safety risk assessments (within LATAM and EU Countries). Reporting directly to the Director of Operation – DOP.

Areas of Interest: Project Management, EPC Projects, Electrical Engineering, MV&HV Electrical Substations, Renewable Energy Technologies, Power Generation, Special Electrical Studies (Power Systems).
